summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.3 mm), cloud levels (up 1468 m), and light levels (up 8571 lux) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 6.6m higher than yesterday, 849.9m lower than the past week, 1467.5m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 765m minimum and 2220m maximum, with an average of 1272.2m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2120m and 2740m.
